Title: Climate neutrality: Pathways for achieving the European Green Deal Objectives
Teaser: The European Union is committed to becoming climate-neutral by 2050 to fulfil its commitment to the Paris Agreement. The 14 research projects featured in this CORDIS Results Pack have developed a suite of models and tools that are able to assess the benefits, costs, risks, trade-offs and synergies with other policy objectives of strategies and investments associated with the transition to climate neutrality.
